faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Answers to the most frequently asked questions about orders, delivery and our products.
faq.q1: How can I place an order?
faq.a1: Placing an order is very easy! Add the product you like to the cart and click the 'Proceed to Checkout' button on the cart page to contact us directly via WhatsApp.
faq.a2: Yes, every composition at 'Designed Shalala' - baskets, flower bouquets and chocolate boxes - is carefully and lovingly created entirely by hand. This means every product is unique.
faq.q3: Can I order a custom design?
faq.a3: Of course! Our main work is to bring your dream design to life. Contact us through our 'Contact' page, share your ideas, and we will create a unique composition for you.
faq.q4: How far in advance should I place an order?
faq.a4: Especially for large baskets and complex designs, it is recommended to place your order at least 1-2 weeks before your wedding or engagement date. For small gifts, ordering 2-3 days in advance is usually sufficient.
